channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: FBI: DNA from glove near Guthrie home appears to match glove worn by suspect
item.description: The FBI says a glove containing DNA was found about two miles from Nancy Guthrie's Arizona home and appears to match those worn by a masked person outside her front door the night she vanished.
item.content:encoded:
The FBI says a glove containing DNA was found about two miles from Nancy Guthrie's Arizona home and appears to match those worn by a masked person outside her front door the night she vanished.

(Image credit: Ty O'Neil)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Former DHS Secretary Napolitano talks about the past and future of ICE
item.description: As Congress stalls on DHS funding and debates body cameras and warrants for ICE raids, former DHS Secretary Janet Napolitano talks about the department's past and future.
item.content:encoded: As Congress stalls on DHS funding and debates body cameras and warrants for ICE raids, former DHS Secretary Janet Napolitano talks about the department's past and future.
item.dc:creator: Sarah Robbins

item.title: Obama responds to Trump sharing racist AI video depicting him as an ape
item.description: "There doesn't seem to be any shame about this among people who used to feel like you had to have some sort of decorum," Obama said in an interview that was posted on YouTube Saturday.
item.content:encoded:
"There doesn't seem to be any shame about this among people who used to feel like you had to have some sort of decorum," Obama said in an interview that was posted on YouTube Saturday.

(Image credit: Scott Olson)
item.dc:creator: Chandelis Duster

item.title: Tumbleweeds, as symbolic of the Western U.S. as cowboys, are an invasive plant
item.description: Tumbleweeds roll along in Western movies and on the landscape of the U.S. high plains, but they're also an invasive nuisance for farmers.
item.content:encoded: Tumbleweeds roll along in Western movies and on the landscape of the U.S. high plains, but they're also an invasive nuisance for farmers.
item.dc:creator: Calen Moore

item.title: For U.S. pairs skater Danny O'Shea, these Olympics are 30 years in the making
item.description: Danny O'Shea turned 35 at his first Olympics, after three decades of skating and two reversed retirements.
item.content:encoded:
Danny O'Shea turned 35 at his first Olympics, after three decades of skating and two reversed retirements.

(Image credit: Elsa)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman

item.title: Four people on NASA'S Crew-12 arrive at the International Space Station
item.description: The crew will spend the next eight months conducting experiments to prepare for human exploration beyond Earth's orbit.
item.content:encoded:
The crew will spend the next eight months conducting experiments to prepare for human exploration beyond Earth's orbit.

(Image credit: NASA)
item.dc:creator: Lydia Calitri

item.title: US military reports a series of airstrikes against Islamic State targets in Syria
item.description: The U.S. military says the strikes were carried out in retaliation of the December ambush that killed two U.S. soldiers and one American civilian interpreter.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. military says the strikes were carried out in retaliation of the December ambush that killed two U.S. soldiers and one American civilian interpreter.

(Image credit: Lolita Baldor)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: ChatGPT promised to help her find her soulmate. Then it betrayed her
item.description: ChatGPT sent screenwriter Micky Small down a fantastical rabbit hole. Now, she's finding her way out.
item.content:encoded:
ChatGPT sent screenwriter Micky Small down a fantastical rabbit hole. Now, she's finding her way out.

(Image credit: Courtney Theophin)
item.dc:creator: Shannon Bond

item.title: Ilia Malinin, U.S. figure skater favored for gold, finishes 8th
item.description: Malinin, undefeated since 2023, stumbled and fell multiple times, landing far off the podium. Mikhail Shaidorov of Kazakhstan won gold in an upset that shocked even himself.
item.content:encoded:
Malinin, undefeated since 2023, stumbled and fell multiple times, landing far off the podium. Mikhail Shaidorov of Kazakhstan won gold in an upset that shocked even himself.

(Image credit: Andreas Rentz)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman

item.title: DHS says immigration agents appear to have lied about shooting in Minnesota
item.description: Julio Cesar Sosa-Celis was shot in the leg during the incident. Another Venezuelan man was also accused of attacking an immigration officer.
item.content:encoded:
Julio Cesar Sosa-Celis was shot in the leg during the incident. Another Venezuelan man was also accused of attacking an immigration officer.

(Image credit: John Moore)
item.dc:creator: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán
